Purebread - Rosemary Olive
I got this loaf of Rosemary Olive from Purebread last Saturday.
It was a great buying experience.
This is what's left of it after a day and a half.
Overall rating 5.5/10
The olives in this loaf were the only dashes of flavour to be found; mrs. rosemary has gone missing. There was no dispersion of savour throughout the white crumb. The crust had a great crunch factor but was difficult to cut.
I enjoyed this bread most lightly toasted with generous butter.
